text: [Onon, ki cunin podoşe dorand, hamon] tavʙakunandagon, parastişgaron, siposguzoron, rūzadoron, ruku'kunandagon, saçdakunandagon, vodorandagon ʙa korhoi pisandida va ʙozdorandagon az korhoi nopisand va posdoroni hudud [va ahkomi] ilohī hastand. Va on mu'minonero, [ki cunin hastand, ʙa ʙihişt] ʙaşorat ʙideh
